commit message: Adding screenshots
Added screenshots to README.md
New screenshots
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:ram-on/SkyTube
Added license details to README.md
Added channel browser screenshot to README.md
Adding download apk button
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:ram-on/SkyTube
Added alternative download methods to README.md
Minor updates to README.md
Update README.md
External Android apps can now instruct SkyTube to open and play the desired YouTube video.
Added XML GUI for channel subscriptions.
Started implementing virtual channel subscription.
Channel bookmarking - done
Added subs drawer indicator.
New Theme:  using app compat.
Subs drawer now opens in front of the actionbar (now using toolbar).
Improving the aesthetics of the subs drawer.
Channels in the sub drawer are now clickable.
Improvements with respect to channel browsing.
Library updates
Users will now be notified is new videos are uploaded to their subbed channels.

Fixed a bug where channel fragment took ages to load.  This is as SubscriptionsDb#isUserSubscribedToChannel() was generating YouTubeChannel objects... and for each obj it was checking for recent channel activity.
Once a subbed channel is clicked (from the subs list), the new video notification will be removed.

- InternetImageView tasks are now ran in parallel, hence much faster image downloads and more fluid experience.
- GetSubscribedChannelsTask can now run in parallel with GetYouTubeVideosTask which will give a much faster loading experience.

- Comments now can display author's avatar/thumbnail
- Optimisation of the InternetImageView
A progress bar is now displayed when a list of videos is being retrieved from the servers.
Progress bar is now displayed when subbed channel are being loaded.
Fixed possible crash on certain channels.
Fixed possible crash on certain channels.

- YouTubeVideoPlayerFragment:  Channel thumbnail is now displayed and clickable.  Tasks now run in parallel, hence faster startup
- Channel Browser:  AppBarLayout is now being used (for heading/toolbar/actionbar) + RecyclerView (instead of GridView - such that it now allows proper Toolbar hiding + scrolling)
Fixed a YouTube Bug in which channels with no thumbnail/avatar will return a link to the default thumbnail that does NOT start with 'http' or 'https' which was causing the app to crash.
Minor aesthetic update to the channel thumbnail (Channel Browser).
